thread.title: In Cybercrime, Every Piece Of Data Has A Price
thread.title_full: In Cybercrime, Every Piece Of Data Has A Price

title: In Cybercrime, Every Piece Of Data Has A Price
text:
22 In Cybercrime, Every Piece Of Data Has A Price 
Homeland Security Today: In the golden age of cybercrime, the hidden data economy continues to boom, according to a recent McAfee report. The report highlighted the growth of this market as having become a place where any conceivable illicit product is for sale or rent -- from personal data, cyber tools, botnets and beyond, cyber criminals are increasingly resembling a service industry.
